how many: How many species do you want review? Choose {count} if you want to all the species in {country}
set language description: This changes the language of the bird species. Other players that join your game can pick another language.
waiting for host: Waiting until the {host} starts the game.
waiting for host to click next question: Waiting for {host} to continue to the next question
your name: What's your name. You can pick any name you want.
